/usr/lib64/openmpi/bin/mpicxx    -fopenmp -DPV_USE_THREADS -I /usr/local/cuda/include -DPV_CUDA -I /nh/compneuro/Data/cuDNN/cudnn-6.5-linux-R1 -DPV_CUDNN -DPV_DIR="\"/home/bbroompeltz/workspace/PetaVision\"" -fopenmp -DPV_USE_THREADS -g0 -O3   CMakeFiles/MLPTest.dir/src/GTLayer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MLPTest.dir/src/ComparisonLayer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MLPTest.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MLPTest.dir/src/InputLayer.cpp.o  -o Release/MLPTest  -L/home/bbroompeltz/workspace/PetaVision/lib -rdynamic ../../PetaVision/lib/libpv.a -lgdal /nh/compneuro/Data/cuDNN/cudnn-6.5-linux-R1/libcudnn.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so -Wl,-rpath,/home/bbroompeltz/workspace/PetaVision/lib:/nh/compneuro/Data/cuDNN/cudnn-6.5-linux-R1:/usr/local/cuda/lib64
